11 Elements in 10 Groups (2 ED Lens Elements), Vibration Reduction Lens-shift, Motion Blur Reduction, Aperture Electronically Controlled ND Filter (-2.0 AV) Insertion, Contrast-detect AF, Autofocus Area Selection: Center, Face Detection, Target Finding, Focus Range: 50 cm (W), 1 m (T), Macro close-up Mode: 1 cm (W), Focus Lock, Monitor Size 3 inch Diagonal, 5-level Brightness Adjustment, Monitor Frame Coverage (Shooting Mode) and Monitor Frame Coverage (Playback Mode) : 96% Horizontal, 96% Vertical, Internal Memory 83 MB, In Camera Image Editing: Color Options, Crop, Data Imprint, D-Lighting, Edit Movie, Filter Effects, Fisheye, Miniature Effect, Monochrome, Movie Footage Trim, Paint, Print Order, Protect, Quick Retouch, Red Eye Correction, Rotate Image, Selective Color, Skin Softening, Slide Show, Small Picture, Soft, Toy Camera, Voice Memo, Sequence Display Option, Shutter Speed: 4 sec. (When Scene Mode is Set to Fireworks Show), Supported Languages: Arabic, Bengali, Bulgarian, Chinese (Simplified and Traditional), Czech, Danish, Dutch, English, Finnish, French, German, Greek, Hindi, Hungarian, Indonesian, Italian, Japanese, Korean, Marathi, Norwegian, Persian, Polish, Portugese (European and Brazilian), Romanian, Russian, Serbian, Spanish, Swedish, Tamil, Thai, Turkish, Ukranian, Vietnamese, Power Sources: 4 AA-size Batteries, Two Rechargeable EN-MH2 NiMH Batteries, Battery Life (Shots Per Charge): AA Alkaline: 150 shots, AA Lithium: 660 shots, EN-MH2: 410 shots, Operating Environment: Temperature - 0° C to 40° C, Humidity - 85% or Less, Battery Life (Movies): Alkaline Batteries 10 minutes, Lithium Batteries 1 hour 25 minutes, EN-MH2 Batteries 55minutes

Exposure Mode: Programmed Auto, Scene Mode: Back Light, Beach, Black and White Copy, Close Up, Dusk/Dawn, Easy Panorama, Food, Landscape, Museum, Night Landscape, Night Portrait, Party/Indoor, Pet Portrait, Portrait, Snow, Sports, Sunset
